title: The Prince Coming Out of the Closet - Novel Updates
tags: Detectives   Handsome Male Lead   Martial Spirits   Secret Identity   Smart Couple   Strong Love Interests
author: 花狸子
description: To avoid being pursued by the detective Shan Qingyun, the playboy Chu Yizhen had to pretend to be a hooligan and street punk. When the detective was provoked, life wouldn’t be easy for Chu, who was a real Prince. Now Chu finally understood: he shouldn’t have hit on Shan Qingyun in the beginning! He regreted it but it seemed to be too late.>
